name: megahorn
short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: Utilizing its tough and impressive horn, the user rams into the foe with no letup.
flavor_text.platinum: Utilizing its tough and impressive horn, the user rams into the foe with no letup.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: Using its tough and impressive horn, the user rams into the foe with no letup.
